p1.title: Social Media
p1.description: In which social media do you want the influencer to promote you?

p2.title: Social Media
p2.description: How many posts, stories and/or highlights do you want the influencer to do?

p3.title: Dates
p3.description: What is the date range you want the influence to advertise?

p4.title: Description
p4.description: Please give a description of what you expect from the the influencer.

p5.title: Upload
p5.description: It is time to upload the file(s) the influencer will need to promote your product.

p1.title: Select account type
p1.description: Brand or influencer? Depending on the account type, you will have access to different tools specially designed for you.

p2.title: Tell us where you are.
p2.description: Tell us where you live to have better performance with our algorithm.

p3.title: Tell us where you are.
p3.description: We need a little more information from you. You would need your email to login.

p4.title: Tell us where you are.
p4.description: We need a little more information from you. You would need your email to login.

p5.title: Last step!
p5.description: Please enter your phone number. After this, you'll be all set.
